channel.title: More moderators
channel.description:
hey when i do ::givemoderator they relog and it won''t save so at actionsender.java i got this http://gyazo.com/3ffeb436216988ff626c55bfac9db585
when i put a line under it this error gives me at compiler
[img]http://gyazo.com/bbfa16a970550c2b491fb0d3835ff684.png[/img]
Something else, when i type in shift + 6 i get 2 ^^ instead of 1. same with this: with coma''s i get 2 of them when i do shift + comma i get "" this please help

item.title: More moderators
item.dc:creator: @beats beats
item.description:
@beats wrote:

[quote=“Bl3nd, post:3, topic:522614”]Or put the names in the already declared ones. I’m pretty sure you don’t have to make another string, you can just use the ones that has “fizz” (admin), “ixxixxi” (donor) or whatever and just keep adding names to the list.[/quote]that doesn’'t work then ill get a error[quote=“asshole_rule, post:2, topic:522614”]You have the array of DONORS and ADMINS, declared twice in your code, you only need it once.

Either rename them, or remove them.[/quote]yes but that’'s just automatic

Read full topic

item.title: More moderators
item.dc:creator: @Bl3nd Bl3nd
item.description:
@Bl3nd wrote:

Or put the names in the already declared ones. I’m pretty sure you don’t have to make another string, you can just use the ones that has “fizz” (admin), “ixxixxi” (donor) or whatever and just keep adding names to the list.

Read full topic

item.title: More moderators
item.dc:creator: @asshole_rule asshole_rule
item.description:
@asshole_rule wrote:

You have the array of DONORS and ADMINS, declared twice in your code, you only need it once.

Either rename them, or remove them.

Read full topic
